pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==========GenomeHubs==========Installation============:: conda install -c tolkit genomehubsor pip install genomehubsYou can also install the in-development version with:: pip install https://github.com/genomehubs/genomehubs/archive/main.zipDocumentation=============https://genomehubs.readthedocs.io/Development===========To run all tests run:: toxChangelog=========2.0.0 (2020-07-02)------------------* First release on PyPI.
